instruction: Given the following input, generate a 3-sentence dialogue between a customer and an auto-mechanic.
input: The customer's car won't start and their brakes are squeaking.
output:
Customer: My car won't start and my brakes are squeaking. Can you help me out?
Auto-mechanic: Sure thing! Can you tell me more about the symptoms of your car?
Customer: Well, when I turn the key it just won't start and I hear a squeaking coming from the brakes.
Auto-mechanic: Got it! We'll run a diagnostic to pinpoint the root of the issues and get you back on the road as soon as possible.
